sn43.1:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the unconditioned and the path that leads to the unconditioned.
sn43.1:4.5: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn43.1:4.7: And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?
sn43.1:4.9: This is called the path that leads to the unconditioned.
sn43.1:5.1: So, mendicants, I’ve taught you the unconditioned and the path that leads to the unconditioned.
sn43.1:5.2: Out of compassion, I’ve done what a teacher should do for the benefit of their disciples.
sn43.1:5.3: Here are these roots of trees, and here are these empty huts.
sn43.1:5.4: Practice absorption, mendicants! Don’t be negligent! Don’t regret it later!
sn43.1:5.6: This is my instruction to you.”
